mapper.select: select distinct user_name, password, user.eid, delete_flag, `user`.ins_user_id, `user`.ins_timestamp, `user`.upd_user_id, `user`.upd_timestamp, role.role_code,m.name from user_info user inner join emp_role_info role on user.eid = role.eid inner join (select CATEGORY_CODE, code, name from cd_master_m where CATEGORY_CODE = '0040') m on m.code = role.role_code where user_name = #{username} and password = password(#{password}) and DELETE_FLAG = 1
